name: Air Hockey HD
description:
Air Hockey has come to your phone and tablet! Challenge your friends to a game of air hockey without the need to purchase a table and show them when it comes to competitive sports you cannot be beaten.

With five player modes to challenge you against the AI, you'll be able to practice and improve your game before you take on your friends.

Now in HD, the air hockey app is sure to keep you entertained, play against your friends or against AI but either way prepare to have the best air hockey game you've ever experienced.
